flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
On dit que quand le ciel s’est obscurci à
cause des cendres d’un volcan, le feu
d’un Pyrax aurait remplacé le soleil.

When volcanic ash darkened the
atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s
fire provided a replacement for the sun.

Quand il se bat, il fait pleuvoir des
écailles enflammées de ses six ailes et
transforme les alentours en mer de feu.

A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings
of their battles, since they use their
six wings to scatter their ember scales.

Thought to be an embodiment of the sun,
it appeared during a bitterly cold winter
and saved Pokémon from freezing.

Thought to be an embodiment of the sun,
it appeared during a bitterly cold winter
and saved Pokémon from freezing.

たたかいになると　６まいの　ハネから
ひのこの　りんぷんを　まきちらして
あたり　いちめんを　ひのうみにする。

싸울 때는 6개의 날개에서
불꽃 가루를 흩뿌려서
주변 일대를 불바다로 만든다.

Quand il se bat, il fait pleuvoir des écailles
enflammées de ses six ailes et transforme les
alentours en mer de feu.

Schüttelt sich glühenden Staub aus seinen
sechs Flügeln und verwandelt das Umfeld in
ein einziges Meer aus Flammen.

Cuando combate, despide escamas ardientes de sus
seis alas y genera un mar ígneo a su alrededor.

Quando lotta, sparge scaglie infuocate dalle sue
sei ali, creando tutto intorno un mare di fuoco.

A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their
battles, since they use their six wings to scatter
their ember scales.

戦いになると　６枚の　羽から
火の粉の　りんぷんを　まき散らして
あたり　一面を　火の海にする。

かざんばいで　ちじょうが　まっくらに
なったとき　ウルガモスの　ほのおが
たいようの　かわりに　なったという。

화산재로 지상이 캄캄하게
되었을 때 불카모스의 불꽃이
태양을 대신했다고 한다.

On dit que quand le ciel s’est obscurci à cause
des cendres d’un volcan, le feu d’un Pyrax aurait
remplacé le soleil.

Es heißt, als das Land einst unter einer düsteren
Wolke aus Vulkanasche lag, übernahm es die Rolle
der Sonne.

Antaño, las cenizas volcánicas cubrieron los cielos.
Entonces, sus llamaradas sirvieron de sol.

Si dice che quando il mondo fu oscurato da ceneri
vulcaniche, le fiamme di Volcarona abbiano sostituito
il sole.

When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is
said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement
for the sun.

火山灰で　地上が　真っ暗に
なったとき　ウルガモスの　炎が
太陽の　かわりに　なったという。

たたかいになると　６まいの　ハネから
ひのこの　りんぷんを　まきちらして
あたり　いちめんを　ひのうみにする。

싸울 때는 6개의 날개에서
불꽃 가루를 흩뿌려서
주변 일대를 불바다로 만든다.

Quand il se bat, il fait pleuvoir des écailles enflammées
de ses six ailes et transforme les alentours en mer de feu.

Schüttelt sich glühenden Staub aus seinen sechs Flügeln und
verwandelt das Umfeld in ein einziges Meer aus Flammen.

Cuando combate, despide escamas ardientes de sus seis alas
y genera un mar ígneo a su alrededor.

Quando lotta, sparge scaglie infuocate dalle sue sei ali,
creando tutto intorno un mare di fuoco.

A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their
battles, since they use their six wings to scatter
their ember scales.

戦いになると　６枚の　羽から
火の粉の　りんぷんを　まき散らして
あたり　一面を　火の海にする。

かざんばいで　ちじょうが　まっくらに
なったとき　ウルガモスの　ほのおが
たいようの　かわりに　なったという。

화산재로 지상이 캄캄하게
되었을 때 불카모스의 불꽃이
태양을 대신했다고 한다.

On dit que quand le ciel s’est obscurci à cause des cendres
d’un volcan, le feu d’un Pyrax aurait remplacé le soleil.

Es heißt, als das Land einst unter einer düsteren Wolke aus
Vulkanasche lag, übernahm es die Rolle der Sonne.

Antaño, las cenizas volcánicas cubrieron los cielos. Entonces,
sus llamaradas sirvieron de sol.

Si dice che quando il mondo fu oscurato da ceneri vulcaniche,
le fiamme di Volcarona abbiano sostituito il sole.

When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is
said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement
for the sun.

火山灰で　地上が　真っ暗に
なったとき　ウルガモスの　炎が
太陽の　かわりに　なったという。

ほのおの　りんぷんを　ふりまきながら
とびまわる。　こだいの　ひとびとは
たいようのいかりと　よび　おそれた。

불꽃의 인분을 흩뿌리며
날아다닌다. 고대 사람들은
태양의 분노라고 부르며 두려워했다.

一邊散佈火焰鱗粉，一邊四處飛翔。
古代的人們稱呼牠為太陽的怒火，
對牠十分畏懼。

Il décrit des cercles dans le ciel en faisant
pleuvoir des écailles enflammées. Il était jadis
surnommé « le courroux solaire ».

Während es umherfliegt, verteilt es glühenden
Flügelstaub. Einst wurde es von den Menschen
gefürchtet und als „Zorn der Sonne“ bezeichnet.

Esparce escamas flamígeras a medida que surca
el cielo. Era temido por la gente de tiempo ha,
que lo apodaron la Ira del Sol.

Vola spargendo scaglie infuocate.
Era temuto dai popoli dell’antichità, che lo
chiamavano “Ira del sole”.

As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was
feared by ancient people, who referred to it as
“the rage of the sun.”

炎の　鱗粉を　振りまきながら
飛びまわる。　古代の　人々は
太陽の怒りと　呼び　恐れた。

一边挥撒火焰鳞粉一边到处飞翔。
古代的人们惧怕地称之为太阳的怒火。

もえさかる　ほのおのまゆから　うまれ
さむさに　くるしむひとや　ポケモンを
すくったという　でんせつが　ある。

타오르는 불꽃의 고치에서 태어나
추위에 괴로워하는 사람이나
포켓몬을 구했다는 전설이 있다.

傳說中，牠是從熊熊燃燒著
火焰的繭中誕生。會去救助
受寒冷所苦的人和寶可夢。

Selon la légende, il serait né d’un cocon
de flammes et serait venu à la rescousse
des humains et des Pokémon souffrant du froid.

Alten Legenden zufolge wurde es aus einem
lodernden Kokon geboren, um von Kälte
bedrohte Menschen und Pokémon zu retten.

Una leyenda relata cómo nació de un capullo en
llamas para acudir al rescate de humanos y
Pokémon ateridos por el frío.

Secondo una leggenda è nato da un bozzolo
infuocato per salvare dal freddo Pokémon
ed esseri umani.

According to legends, it was hatched from a
flaming cocoon to save people and Pokémon
that were suffering from the cold.

燃え盛る　炎の繭から　生まれ
寒さに　苦しむ人や　ポケモンを
救ったという　伝説が　ある。

传说，它从熊熊燃烧着
火焰的茧中诞生，会救助
受寒冷之苦的人和宝可梦。

ほのおの　りんぷんを　ふりまき
かじを　おこすとも　さむさに
くるしむものを　すくうとも　いう。

불꽃의 인분을 흩뿌려
화재를 일으킴으로써 추위에
고통받는 자들을 돕는다고도 한다.

據說牠會飛灑火焰鱗粉造成
火災，也有說法說牠會去
救助受寒冷所苦的生物。

Certains disent qu’il répand ses écailles ardentes
pour provoquer des incendies, d’autres,
pour sauver ceux qui souffrent du froid.

Einige sagen, es verstreue glühenden Flügelstaub,
um Brände auszulösen. Andere meinen, es rette
dadurch jene, die unter Kälte leiden.

Se dice que sus escamas flamígeras pueden tanto
causar incendios como amparar a aquellos que
sufren las inclemencias del frío.

Si dice che le scaglie infuocate sparse da
Volcarona a volte causino incendi e altre volte
salvino chi soffre il freddo.

Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it
does this to start fires. Others say it’s trying to
rescue those that suffer in the cold.

炎の　りんぷんを　振りまき
火事を　起こすとも　寒さに
苦しむものを　救うとも　いう。

据说它会挥撒自己的火焰鳞粉，
造成火灾。也有说法说它会
拯救遭受寒冷之苦的生灵。

もえさかる　ほのおの　まゆから
うまれる。　こだいの　へきがに
ほのおのかみとして　えがかれている。

활활 타오르는 불의 고치에서
태어났다. 고대의 벽화에
불꽃의 신으로 그려져 있다.

從熊熊燃燒著火焰的
繭中誕生。在古代的
壁畫上被描繪為火神。

Né d’un cocon enflammé, ce Pokémon apparaît
sur d’anciennes fresques représenté comme
une divinité du feu.

Ramoth wurde aus einem lodernden Kokon
geboren. In antiken Wandmalereien ist es als
Feuergottheit abgebildet.

Nace de una pupa envuelta en llamas. En algunas
pinturas rupestres aparece representado como
una deidad del fuego.

È nato da un bozzolo infuocato. Nelle pitture
rupestri dell’antichità viene raffigurato come
una divinità delle fiamme.

This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of
raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as
a deity of fire.

燃えさかる　炎の　繭から
生まれる。　古代の　壁画に
炎の神として　描かれている。

从熊熊燃烧的火焰之茧中
诞生。在古代的壁画上
被描绘为火之神。

ability.effect:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being burned.

Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or magma armor.
ability.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
move.short_effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.
